title: Best of The Herd for Jul 13, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Jul 13, 2020
description:
The Lakers can't win the NBA title

Bill Belichick is loosening up after losing Brady

Is the NBA becoming too political?

Where Colin was right and wrong

The 3 teams in Colin's NBA Championship bubble


Guest: Mark Medina, NBA Reporter live from the NBA bubble in Orlando

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
